Title: Requires a study of the implementation of medical marihuana in regards to banking, tax revenue collection, and employment tax collection issues
Summary: Requires a study of the implementation of medical marihuana in regards to banking, tax revenue collection, and employment tax collection issues.
LawCode: Add ยง3369-f, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring a study of the implementation of medical marihuana in regards to banking, tax revenue collection, and employment tax collection issues
